title: BACnetClientBase (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC BACnetClientBase EXTENDS CBML.ETrigATo IMPLEMENTS
IBACnetClient
, IBACnetClientInternal
Base class for all BACnet-Client-FBs. It hold both source Address and target Address for the
BACnet-Client-FBs. The source address gets automatically set to the device of the parent BACnet-Server-FB (in
the device tree BACnet-Clients are always childs of BACnet-Servers). The target address has to be set
(TargetDeviceAddress-, TargetDeviceNumber Property) before any call to the other functions of the BACnet-Client-FBs.

rows.Name: eStatus
rows.Comment: If an error occured, the error state.

rows:
If an error occured (this means eStatus <> BACNET_STATUS_OK), whereas the sent BACnet-Request was answered
with an specific error information, the latter is contained in this structure.

The State in which the FB is during execution:0: No execution, resetted state1: Searching for the Target-Device and a valid address for it2: Sending the BACnet-Request into the network3: Waiting for the answer (if there is one) to the BACnet-Request made in 24: Finishing the call, setting of the output variables
